description: meta info used by the siesta parser.  All names are expected to start with x_siesta_

metaInfos.description: system label specified in siesta calculation.  This determines many of the filenames.
metaInfos.name: x_siesta_system_label

metaInfos.description: system name specified in siesta calculation.  This is purely a description.
metaInfos.name: x_siesta_system_name

metaInfos.description: XC authors (really: XC functional) in siesta calculation.
metaInfos.name: x_siesta_xc_authors
